page.title: 11 A DAY IN THE LIFE OF..P.M.
page.content:
{ Charlotte Barnes.Age 11.Class 1. { Saltwood Primary School.1985.}
On Monday afternoon we have a choice between Woodwork,Topic,Language or Art & Craft.We clear up at 2.30 and then Mr.Thompson,out teacher,reads us part of a story or we have a sing-song. School finishes at 3 o'clock but we have clubs until 4.When I get home I change into my play clothes and go out to meet my friends. At about 6 o'clock we have tea and then I might play out or watch T.V.until it is time for bed at about 9.30.I read for a while and "Lights- out" is at 10 o'clock.
